page.title: 14LIFE-SAVING DEMONSTRATION
page.content: AFTER THE SCHOOL SWIMMING GALA THE LIFE-SAVERS TOOK PART IN A DEMONSTRATION.IWAS ONE OF THEM. WE HAD TO DEMONSTRATE SEVERAL WAYS OF RESCUING SOMEONE. THE SCENE WAS SET AT THE EDGE OF A RIVER WHERE FOUR CHILDREN WERE PLAYING ON A LI-LO IN THE MIDDLE OF A RIVER. SOMEONE ACCIDENTLY LET IT DOWN.WHEN THEY REALISED THIS THEY BEGAN TO STRUGGLE. I SWAM OUT WITH A BALL THAT I WAS PLAYING WITH,THREW IT TO ONE OF THE CHILDREN AND TOLD THEM TO KICK THEIR LEGS WHILE HOLDING ONTO THE BALL.AT THE SAME TIME SOMEONE ELSE THREW A ROPE AND HAULED IN ANOTHER CHILD WHILE TWO OTHERS WERE TOWED IN BY OTHER RESCUERS.WE THEN HAD TO DEMONSTRATE RESCUSITATION METHODS ON ONE OF THE RESCUED CHILDREN.
